description: PowerSAS.m is a robust, efficient and scalable power grid analysis framework based on semi-analytical solutions (SAS) technology for MATLAB/Octave users. It provides various functionalities for power grid analysis including steady-state analysis, dynamic analysis and hybrid extended-term analysis. It features high numerical robustness, enhanced computational performance and highly customizable and extensible user interfaces.
name: POWERSAS.m ( A POWER GRID ANALYSIS TOOKBOX BASED ON SEMI-ANALYTICAL SOLUTION APPROACH)
